video.title: TURN: Washington's Spies
video.synopsis: Set in 1778, this period drama recounts the story of Abe Woodhull, an American cabbage farmer obliged to begin spying on the British enemy.

episodes.synopsis: After he defends a bar owner in a brawl with a British captain, Abe becomes a murder suspect. Later, a friend tries to recruit him as a rebel spy.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Abe must discover who murdered Capt. Joyce before Anna is framed for the crime. Meanwhile, in a Connecticut jail, Ben and Caleb interrogate Simcoe.
episodes.title: Who By Fire

episodes.synopsis: Rebel militiamen plan to betray Ben and Scott to the British in return for pardons. Abe gathers intelligence on a trip to New York with Richard.
episodes.title: Of Cabbages and Kings

episodes.synopsis: Abe and Richard are ordered to dig up local gravestones to fortify the garrison. Ben and Caleb use trickery to get Abe's report to Gen. Washington.
episodes.title: Eternity How Long

episodes.synopsis: Hewlett commandeers Anna's male slaves for soldiers, and Caleb and Ben prepare for a secret mission while Washington's army enters enemy territory.
episodes.title: Epiphany

episodes.synopsis: Washington asks Ben, Scott and Sackett to explore the idea of a civilian spy ring; Abigail eavesdrops on Andre; a desperate patriot ambushes Abe.
episodes.title: Mr. Culpeper

episodes.synopsis: When Ben hears that Samuel will be released, Caleb offers to fetch him. Abe asks Anna to pose as his wife so he can pass the New York checkpoints.
episodes.title: Mercy Moment Murder Measure

episodes.synopsis: Against Abe's wishes, Anna searches for enemy intelligence at Andre's dinner party, and Selah tells Ben about Samuel's final days.
episodes.title: Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Abe intervenes when Simcoe manufactures evidence to weed out rebel conspirators in Setauket. Ben tells Washington about a change in British plans.
episodes.title: Against Thy Neighbor

episodes.synopsis: Mary struggles with the realization that Abe is a rebel spy, Anna learns that Selah is alive, and Ben and Caleb lead a raid to save patriot families.
episodes.title: The Battle of Setauket
